title: NASA’s Asteroid Plan Is BORING, No Mo’ Cuomo 12.02.21
itunes:title: NASA’s Asteroid Plan Is BORING, No Mo’ Cuomo 12.02.21
description:
In episode 1041, Jack and Miles are joined by Life As A Gringo's DJ Dramos to discuss CUOMO OUT V2, Republicans Positioning Selves As … Pro Covid Party? Going to Shut Government Down Over Vaccines And Testing, NASA’s Killer Asteroid Plan Isn’t Like ‘Armageddon' at All and more!

  1. CUOMO OUT V2
  2. Republicans Positioning Selves As … Pro Covid Party? Going to Shut Government Down Over Vaccines And Testing
  3. Trump tested positive for Covid few days before Biden debate, chief of staff says in new bookNASA’s Killer Asteroid Plan Isn’t Like ‘Armageddon' at All
  4. NASA is supposed to spot 90% of dangerous asteroids by 2020. It's at 10%
  5. How NASA will practice saving the world from an asteroid apocalypse
  6. Max Q: Get in loser, we’re smashing a spacecraft into an asteroid
  7. Michael Bay Says ‘Armageddon’ Predicted NASA Mission to Crash Into an Asteroid: ‘Our Plan Was Not Far Off’


LISTEN: Idol Eyes by Common Saints

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
